para.p: Regular form: Got Was expanded Now.
With noexpand inserted: Got Was expanded Later.
Using the new protected primitive: Got Was expanded Later.
A Falling STAR. A Falling from grace.
not 1 greater than 2. many greater than 2 .
True is always true . False is always false.
one is odd. two is not odd.
one is one . two is two. many is many.
INVERT 1 greater than 2 . INVERT not many greater than 2.
INVERT one is not odd. INVERT two is odd.
INVERT True should never be false. INVERT False should never be true .
